Detailed Description

BtDeviceAndServiceClass is used to encapsulate the details of the service class, major device class and minor device class bits of a BtDevice. The handling and manipulation of these bits should be made easier by this class.

Member Function Documentation

UINT8 BtDeviceAndServiceClass::GetMajorDeviceClass (   )  const
 

Get the major device class.

GetMajorDeviceClass returns the major device class. The result of this operation is one of the BT_MDC_xxx constants.

Returns:
UINT8 describing the major device class.

UINT8 BtDeviceAndServiceClass::GetMinorDeviceClass (   )  const
 

Get the minor device class.

GetMinorDeviceClass returns the minor device class. The result of this operation is one of the BT_SDC_xxx constants. Depending on the major device class the result can be any combination or only one of the constants mentioned above.

Returns:
UINT8 describing the minor device class.

UINT16 BtDeviceAndServiceClass::GetServiceClass (   )  const
 

Get the service class.

GetServiceClass gets the serivce class. The result of this operation is any combination of the BT_MSC_xxx constants.

Returns:
UINT16 describing the service class.

BOOLEAN BtDeviceAndServiceClass::operator!= (  const BtDeviceAndServiceClass &  device_and_service_class  )  const

void BtDeviceAndServiceClass::SetMajorDeviceClass (  UINT8  major_device_class  ) 
 

Set the major device class.

SetMajorDeviceClass sets the major device class. The major device class is one of the BT_MDC_xxx constants.

Parameters:
major_device_class The major device class to be set.

void BtDeviceAndServiceClass::SetMinorDeviceClass (  UINT8  minor_device_class  ) 
 

Set the minor device class.

SetMinorDeviceClass sets the minor device class. The minor device class is one of the BT_SDC_xxx constants. Depending on the major device class the minor device class can be any combination or only one of the constants mentioned above.

Parameters:
minor_device_class The minor device class to be set.

void BtDeviceAndServiceClass::SetServiceClass (  UINT16  service_class  ) 
 

Set the service class.

SetServiceClass sets the service class. The service class is nay combination of the BT_SDC_xxx constants.

Parameters:
service_class The service class to be set.
